short-des: CS Major @ UC Davis 2022, Published Researcher and Co-Author, DSIML
about-me: I am a sophomore pursuing Computer Science at University of California, Davis. I'm currently a full time student, also working on entreprenurial ideas and my book Data Structures in Modern Languages. Apart from this, I have interned for various companies in the past working in the fields of software, networking, engineering.

Work-Experience.des: Worked in cyber security and assisted customers with troubleshooting computer issues

Work-Experience.des: Offered relevant information on the products and services of the company, and communicated with the IT team to discuss process and performance

Work-Experience.des: Analyzed the Audio Video (AV) connections and departmental documents

Research-Experience.title: Project Bitrac
Research-Experience.des: Serves as an intermediate between a paralytic patient and his surroundings.

Project-Experience.title: Project Gesture
Project-Experience.des: The Project uses finger gestures and real-time object detection to allow the user to interact with his surroundings. http://bit.ly/pgcg - Project Video

Project-Experience.title: Project Seizure
Project-Experience.des: It is an economic approach towards notifying the occurrence of seizures in a patient. Team leader (Made in a group of three). Used python for the back-end and also used Twilio's API. For the front-end we used PHP, HTML, CSS and Google Maps API

Project-Experience.title: Data Stuctures in Modern Languages
Project-Experience.des: Implementing common data structures in safe, modern Rust and Go and writing a book about the same.
